text: Ka Neupeurintah uleh Po gata Taseumah sahja cit sidroe Allah Bek roh taseumah peue-peue nyang laen Teuma beu meucen keu ma ngon ayah c Beu got tahiroe keu ma-ku gata ‘Oh gopnyan tuha beu got tapapah Got salah sidroe got pih bandua Geuh sajan gata sapat takeubah Bek roh takheun ‘euh lom pih bek tadhot Narit nyang patot beu got tapeugah Tamarit nyang got tapeumulia
